reuze

Class pt_TimerCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.pt_TimerCode

  • public class pt_TimerCode
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience class to do code profiling.
    Author:
    Keith Woodward, Ryan M

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  pt_TimerCode.Output
      Time unit that is printed

    • Constructor Detail

      • pt_TimerCode

        public pt_TimerCode()
        Default constructor that uses Nanosecond outputs and is named "Untitled".

      • pt_TimerCode

        public pt_TimerCode(java.lang.String name)

      • pt_TimerCode

        public pt_TimerCode(java.lang.String name,
            pt_TimerCode.Output period,
            pt_TimerCode.Output interval)
        Parameters:
        name - A name for this pt_TimerCode, so as to identify the output
        period - output for profiling period duration, or null for none. Note that if you specify null, you'll be getting output on stdOut that is not labelled as coming from this class
        interval - output for interval durations, or null for just the percentage of period time taken

    • Method Detail

      • click

        public void click(java.lang.String name)
        Call to start a profiling period, or to start an interval in an open period
        Parameters:
        name - A helpful name for this interval. Makes it easy to find what bit of code you're measuring

      • lastClick

        public void lastClick()
        Call to end a profiling period, and print the results if printFrequencySeconds have passed since we last printed

      • lastClick

        public void lastClick(boolean print)
        Call to end a profiling period
        Parameters:
        print - true to print results, false no to

      • printAndResetResults

        public void printAndResetResults()

      • recalibrate

        public static void recalibrate(int numTests)
        Calibrates the timer for the machine
        Parameters:
        numTests - 10000 might be about right
